content: fusaka-devnet-0 genesis has been set: <t:1748264400:R>

author: barnabasbusa
content:
The planned timeline for fusaka-devnet-0 is to have fulu on epoch 256. 
Then the following BPOs:
```
BLOB_SCHEDULE:
  - EPOCH: 512
    MAX_BLOBS_PER_BLOCK: 12
  - EPOCH: 768
    MAX_BLOBS_PER_BLOCK: 15
  - EPOCH: 1024
    MAX_BLOBS_PER_BLOCK: 18
  - EPOCH: 1280
    MAX_BLOBS_PER_BLOCK: 9
  - EPOCH: 1584
    MAX_BLOBS_PER_BLOCK: 20
```

author: barnabasbusa
content: This will give us ~1d for evaluating each BPO change.
